DELETE_STORAGE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the storage of the application?, the data and the settings will be deleted.
ABOUT_SITAMET_MESSAGE: SITAMET is a hybrid mobile application that is part of the final projects of the Certificate of Higher Education (HNC) - Multiplatform Applications Development. SITAMET helps you keep track of the movements made in your personal economy. Simple but useful.
CONCEPT_MIN_LENGTH: Must be at least 5 characters long.
CONCEPT_PATTERN: Your concept must contain only numbers, letters, whitespaces, points and commas.
CONCEPT_MAX_LENGTH: Cannot be more that 50 characters long.
VALUE_PATTERN: Must contain only numbers and optional part decimal.
